name: Rage of the Blind Witch
description:
A jealous and blind witch stole all of the eyeballs in the world. Its up to you, the player, to jump over stuff and shoot monsters. Only then can you reach the top of the castle and defeat the horrible curse on the land.

NOTE: Co op requires 2 controllers! attach two controllers and push buttons on the main menu and it should work! :fingerscrossed:

NOTE 2: if you are having issues with Controllers on Windows, try the 1.0.1 version!

Default keys: 

  • Z : JUMP
  • X : SHOOT
  • ARROW KEYS : MOVE
  • ENTER : PAUSE
  • ESCAPE : QUIT

Supported controllers:

  • PLAY STATION
  • XBOX
